data.name: CLI_Verbs_AppAttach_Prop_CreateScript
data.value: If specified, sample PS1 scripts for registration and de-registration will be created. This is currently supported only for VHD volumes.

data.name: CLI_Verbs_AppAttach_Prop_Directory
data.value: Output directory.

data.name: CLI_Verbs_AppAttach_Prop_ExtractCertificate
data.value: If specified, digital certificate will be extracted from the specified package.

data.name: CLI_Verbs_AppAttach_Prop_FileType
data.value: The type of the output file.

data.name: CLI_Verbs_AppAttach_Prop_Name
data.value: File name for the output file. If left empty, the MSIX file name without extension will be used. This parameter is not used in case of multiple input packages.

data.name: CLI_Verbs_AppAttach_Prop_Package
data.value: Full paths to MSIX packages to be converted to app attach format. If the path is a directory, then all MSIX from the folder will be converted.

data.name: CLI_Verbs_AppAttach_Prop_Size
data.value: Size of the container (in MB). Leave empty for auto-selection.

data.name: CLI_Verbs_AppAttach_VerbName
data.value: Creates app attach volume for MSIX packages.

data.name: CLI_Verbs_Dependencies_Prop_Path
data.value: The path to the package.

data.name: CLI_Verbs_Dependencies_VerbName
data.value: Creates a list of relations between package dependencies, including nested dependencies, add-ons and system dependencies.

data.name: CLI_Verbs_Edit_AddCapability_Prop_Name
data.value: The name of the capability to add.

data.name: CLI_Verbs_Edit_AddCapability_VerbName
data.value: Adds a specified capability to the package manifest.

data.name: CLI_Verbs_Edit_AddFile_Prop_Force
data.value: If set then in case the target file exists it will be overridden.

data.name: CLI_Verbs_Edit_AddFile_Prop_Source
data.value: Source file from disk.

data.name: CLI_Verbs_Edit_AddFile_Prop_Target
data.value: Target relative path to current file.

data.name: CLI_Verbs_Edit_AddFile_VerbName
data.value: Adds or replaces a specific file in the package.

data.name: CLI_Verbs_Edit_DeleteFile_Prop_FilePath
data.value: Relative path to removed file (file asterisks are supported).

data.name: CLI_Verbs_Edit_DeleteFile_VerbName
data.value: Deletes a specific file from the package.

data.name: CLI_Verbs_Edit_DeleteRegistryKey_Prop_RegistryKey
data.value: A registry path (for example HKLM\Software\abc) of a registry key to be deleted.

data.name: CLI_Verbs_Edit_DeleteRegistryKey_VerbName
data.value: Deletes a specific registry key.

data.name: CLI_Verbs_Edit_DeleteRegistryValue_Prop_RegistryKey
data.value: A registry path (for example HKLM\Software\abc) of a registry key containg the value to be deleted.

data.name: CLI_Verbs_Edit_DeleteRegistryValue_Prop_RegistryValueName
data.value: A value name to be deleted.

data.name: CLI_Verbs_Edit_DeleteRegistryValue_VerbName
data.value: Deletes a specific registry value.

data.name: CLI_Verbs_Edit_ImportRegistry_Prop_File
data.value: A .reg file (Windows Registry) to be imported.

data.name: CLI_Verbs_Edit_ImportRegistry_Prop_RegistryKey
data.value: A local registry path (for example HKLM\Software\abc) of a registry key to be imported.

data.name: CLI_Verbs_Edit_ImportRegistry_VerbName
data.value: Imports registry from .reg file or local Registry.

data.name: CLI_Verbs_Edit_List_Prop_File
data.value: File path to a file containing the instructions to execute. If not provided, the user can prompt the required content from the console.

data.name: CLI_Verbs_Edit_List_VerbName
data.value: Executes a list of commands, either from a file or from a command prompt.

data.name: CLI_Verbs_Edit_Prop_PackagePath
data.value: Full path to the edited package.

data.name: CLI_Verbs_Edit_SetBuildMetaData_Prop_Name
data.value: The name of the component, for example SignTool.exe.

data.name: CLI_Verbs_Edit_SetBuildMetaData_Prop_Version
data.value: The version of the component, for example 1.0.0.

data.name: CLI_Verbs_Edit_SetBuildMetaData_VerbName
data.value: Adds a specified build meta data to the package manifest.

data.name: CLI_Verbs_Edit_SetIdentity_Prop_Name
data.value: The package name.

data.name: CLI_Verbs_Edit_SetIdentity_Prop_ProcessorArchitecture
data.value: The processor architecture, for example x64, arm or Neutral.

data.name: CLI_Verbs_Edit_SetIdentity_Prop_Publisher
data.value: The DN string of a publisher.

data.name: CLI_Verbs_Edit_SetIdentity_Prop_ResourceId
data.value: The resource ID.

data.name: CLI_Verbs_Edit_SetIdentity_Prop_Version
data.value: The package version. It must be a valid version string. You can also write 'auto' to autoincrement the version, or use placeholders ^ or + to increase a unit, and 'x' or '*' to keep the unit. For example, the version *.*.+.0 would keep the major and minor version from the current value, increase the third position by one, and reset the fourth position to 0.

data.name: CLI_Verbs_Edit_SetIdentity_VerbName
data.value: Sets package identity.

data.name: CLI_Verbs_Edit_SetProperties_Prop_Description
data.value: The package description.

data.name: CLI_Verbs_Edit_SetProperties_Prop_DisplayName
data.value: The display name for the package.

data.name: CLI_Verbs_Edit_SetProperties_Prop_Logo
data.value: The path to a internal logo.

data.name: CLI_Verbs_Edit_SetProperties_Prop_ModificationPackage
data.value: A boolean value representing whether this is a modification package.

data.name: CLI_Verbs_Edit_SetProperties_Prop_PublisherDisplayName
data.value: The display name of the publisher.

data.name: CLI_Verbs_Edit_SetProperties_VerbName
data.value: Sets package properties (like display name, logo, etc.)

data.name: CLI_Verbs_Edit_SetRegistryKey_Prop_RegistryKey
data.value: A registry path (for example HKLM\Software\abc) of a registry key to be set.

data.name: CLI_Verbs_Edit_SetRegistryKey_VerbName
data.value: Sets registry key.

data.name: CLI_Verbs_Edit_SetRegistryValue_Prop_RegistryKey
data.value: Registry key (for example HKLM\Software\abc) containing edited value.

data.name: CLI_Verbs_Edit_SetRegistryValue_Prop_RegistryValueName
data.value: A value name to be set.

data.name: CLI_Verbs_Edit_SetRegistryValue_Prop_Value
data.value: The value.

data.name: CLI_Verbs_Edit_SetRegistryValue_Prop_ValueType
data.value: Value type.

data.name: CLI_Verbs_Edit_SetRegistryValue_VerbName
data.value: Set a specific registry value.

data.name: CLI_Verbs_Edit_VerbName
data.value: Edit a specified MSIX package.

data.name: CLI_Verbs_ExtractCert_Prop_File
data.value: Path to a source package.

data.name: CLI_Verbs_ExtractCert_Prop_Output
data.value: Full file path under which the extracted .CER file will be saved.

data.name: CLI_Verbs_ExtractCert_VerbName
data.value: Extracts the certificate file (.CER) from an already signed MSIX package.

data.name: CLI_Verbs_NewCert_Prop_DisplayName
data.value: The display name for the new certificate.

data.name: CLI_Verbs_NewCert_Prop_Import
data.value: If set, the certificate will be imported to the local store. This option requires that MSIXHeroCLI.exe is started as administrator.

data.name: CLI_Verbs_NewCert_Prop_OutputFolder
data.value: Directory, where certificate files will be saved.

data.name: CLI_Verbs_NewCert_Prop_Password
data.value: Certificate password.

data.name: CLI_Verbs_NewCert_Prop_Subject
data.value: Certificate subject, for example CN=John. If not provided, it will be set automatically from the display name.

data.name: CLI_Verbs_NewCert_Prop_ValidUntil
data.value: Date time until which the certificate can be used for signing purposes. Defaults to one year from today.

data.name: CLI_Verbs_NewCert_VerbName
data.value: Create new certificate for self-signing.

data.name: CLI_Verbs_NewModPack_Prop_CopyFolderStructure
data.value: Indicates whether to copy the folder structure from the parent package. This option is only valid if --parentPackage parameter is defined AND the target file path is a folder.

data.name: CLI_Verbs_NewModPack_Prop_DisplayName
data.value: The displayed name of the new modification package.

data.name: CLI_Verbs_NewModPack_Prop_IncludeFolder
data.value: Path to a folder that will be inserted into the root folder of the new modification package.

data.name: CLI_Verbs_NewModPack_Prop_IncludeRegFile
data.value: Path to a .REG file containing registry keys to be inserted into the new modification package.

data.name: CLI_Verbs_NewModPack_Prop_Name
data.value: The name of the new modification package.

data.name: CLI_Verbs_NewModPack_Prop_OutputPath
data.value: Path to the output file. If the specified value has extension .msix, a packaged package will be created. Otherwise, the value is treated as a folder where unpacked resources will be saved.

data.name: CLI_Verbs_NewModPack_Prop_ParentName
data.value: The name of the parent package.

data.name: CLI_Verbs_NewModPack_Prop_ParentPackagePath
data.value: Full path to the parent package (a manifest or .msix package).

data.name: CLI_Verbs_NewModPack_Prop_ParentPublisher
data.value: The name of the parent package publisher.

data.name: CLI_Verbs_NewModPack_Prop_PublisherDisplayName
data.value: The displayed name of the publisher of the new modification package.

data.name: CLI_Verbs_NewModPack_Prop_PublisherName
data.value: The publisher name of the new modification package.

data.name: CLI_Verbs_NewModPack_Prop_VerbName
data.value: Creates a new modification package.

data.name: CLI_Verbs_NewModPack_Prop_Version
data.value: The version of the new modification package.

data.name: CLI_Verbs_NewModPack_VerbName
data.value: Create a new modification package.

data.name: CLI_Verbs_Pack_Prop_Directory
data.value: Source directory to pack.

data.name: CLI_Verbs_Pack_Prop_NoCompression
data.value: Prevents MSIX Hero from compressing files in the package. By default, files in the package are compressed based on detected file type.

data.name: CLI_Verbs_Pack_Prop_NoValidation
data.value: Skip semantic validation. If you don't specify this option, MSIX Hero performs a full validation of the package.

data.name: CLI_Verbs_Pack_Prop_Package
data.value: Output package path.

data.name: CLI_Verbs_Pack_Prop_RemoveDirectoryAfterPacking
data.value: If set, the input directory will be removed after packing.

data.name: CLI_Verbs_Pack_VerbName
data.value: Pack a folder.

data.name: CLI_Verbs_Sign_Prop_DeviceGuardFile
data.value: Full path to JSON file containing access tokens to AzureAD.

data.name: CLI_Verbs_Sign_Prop_DeviceGuardInteractive
data.value: A switch for interactive Device Guard signing (you will be asked for AzureAD credentials).

data.name: CLI_Verbs_Sign_Prop_DeviceGuardSubject
data.value: Publisher name used for signing with Device Guard.

data.name: CLI_Verbs_Sign_Prop_FilePath
data.value: Full paths to one or more files (separated by space).

data.name: CLI_Verbs_Sign_Prop_IncreaseVersion
data.value: Specifies whether the version should be automatically increased, and (if yes) which component of it. Supported values are [None, Major, Minor, Build, Revision].

data.name: CLI_Verbs_Sign_Prop_NoPublisherUpdate
data.value: Disables the automatic update of publisher name with the value of certificate subject.

data.name: CLI_Verbs_Sign_Prop_PfxFilePath
data.value: Specifies the signing certificate in a file. If the file is in Personal Information Exchange (PFX) format and protected by a password, use the -p option to specify the password.

data.name: CLI_Verbs_Sign_Prop_PfxPassword
data.value: Specifies the password to use when opening a PFX file.

data.name: CLI_Verbs_Sign_Prop_ThumbPrint
data.value: Specifies the SHA1 hash of the signing certificate. The SHA1 hash is commonly specified when multiple certificates satisfy the criteria specified by the remaining switches.

data.name: CLI_Verbs_Sign_Prop_TimeStampUrl
data.value: Specifies the URL of the RFC 3161 time stamp server. If not specified, the default value from MSIX Hero settings will be used.

data.name: CLI_Verbs_Sign_Prop_UseMachineStore
data.value: Specifies that a machine store, instead of a user store, is used.

data.name: CLI_Verbs_Sign_VerbName
data.value: Sign a package.

data.name: CLI_Verbs_Trust_Prop_File
data.value: The file to import (a .CER file or an MSIX package).

data.name: CLI_Verbs_Trust_VerbName
data.value: Import a certificate or a certificate from MSIX to Trusted People store,

data.name: CLI_Verbs_Unpack_Prop_Directory
data.value: Output directory.

data.name: CLI_Verbs_Unpack_Prop_NoValidation
data.value: Skip semantic validation. If you don't specify this option, MSIX Hero performs a full validation of the package.

data.name: CLI_Verbs_Unpack_Prop_Package
data.value: Source package path.

data.name: CLI_Verbs_Unpack_Prop_RemovePackageAfterExtraction
data.value: If set, the input package will be removed after packing.

data.name: CLI_Verbs_Unpack_VerbName
data.value: Unpack an MSIX package to a folder.

data.name: CLI_Verbs_UpdateImpact_Prop_IgnoreVersionMismatch
data.value: Forces the comparison even if the 'newVersion' is not higher than the 'oldVersion'.

data.name: CLI_Verbs_UpdateImpact_Prop_NewPackagePath
data.value: The newer version of the package to compare. Accepted files: *.msix, *.appx, AppxManifest.xml and AppxBlockMap.xml.

data.name: CLI_Verbs_UpdateImpact_Prop_OldPackagePath
data.value: The older version of the package to compare. Accepted files: *.msix, *.appx, AppxManifest.xml and AppxBlockMap.xml.

data.name: CLI_Verbs_UpdateImpact_Prop_OutputXml
data.value: Full file path where the XML file with detailed comparison will be saved.

data.name: CLI_Verbs_UpdateImpact_VerbName
data.value: Analyzes the difference between two packages and predicts the impact on updates.
